doc:
Lee Majors https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Majors 0 Lee Majors (born Harvey Lee Yeary; April 23, 1939) is an American film, television and voice actor. Majors is best known for portraying the characters of Heath Barkley in the American television Western series The Big Valley (1965–1969), Colonel Steve Austin in the American television science fiction action series The Six Million Dollar Man (1973–1978), and Colt Seavers in American television action series The Fall Guy (1981–1986). Lee_Majors ( born Harvey_Lee_Yeary ; April_23_,_1939 ) is an_American_film_,_television_and_voice_actor . Majors is_best_known for portraying the_characters of Heath_Barkley in the_American_television_Western_series_The_Big_Valley_(_1965 – 1969_) , Colonel_Steve_Austin in the_American_television_science_fiction_action series The_Six_Million_Dollar_Man_(_1973 – 1978_) , and Colt_Seavers in American_television_action series The_Fall_Guy ( 1981 – 1986_) .
